CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("/lightning/r/Installation_Address__c/"&Id&"/view", IF(ISBLANK(Secondary_Street__c), IF(ISBLANK(Primary_Street__c), Name ,Primary_Street__c & " " & Primary_Street_Number__c ), Primary_Street__c &" to "& Secondary_Street__c),"_self")
CustomField.label: Installation Address
